content.raw:
We will try to get the frame rate to the correct value. But one of the following will likely happen:

  1) We won't be able to, so you'll have to use whatever framerate is available.

  2) We will get the right frame, but at a lower resolution.


Atlas loads fine with thread_sensors. You just have compile drcsim and gazebo from source.
content.html:
We will try to get the frame rate to the correct value. But one of the following will likely happen:

1) We won't be able to, so you'll have to use whatever framerate is available.

2) We will get the right frame, but at a lower resolution.

Atlas loads fine with thread_sensors. You just have compile drcsim and gazebo from source.
